StaticSkill.DiscoveryMessage: As you are walking through veterinarian center, you hear a suspicious noise outside. Way too focused on the noise, you go to the window to take a look and fail to notice a chair, knocked down by someone, and trip over it. Rubbing your knee as you get up, you sigh as your realise that it's going to hurt for a while now. This city is a mess, you think, if something happens to you, there is no one to satisfy your needs in medical attention. Which brings you an idea - after all, you are a mage, goddamit! Why not create someone who can help? A nurse would do just fine. Of course, regular nurse would be boring, so you are going to make sure she can satisfy your other... needs.
StaticSkill.Description: With the ongoing chaos in the streets of this town, injuries are unavoidable. This spell will satisfy your needs in medical attention, transforming your opponent into a hospital nurse. Of course, a regular nurse would be boring, so...
